content: When I opened my eyes this mornin' and saw the green curtains, I couldn't wait to open the window, and spent a good while just baskin' in the sun.
info: NPC装修任务 - 云果 - 邀请参观对话_云果

content: {A害羞冒烟}Thank you for caring about my life~! The house may not be big mah, but it's real cozy and nice.
info: NPC装修任务 - 云果 - 邀请参观对话_云果

content: I think mah, in the wind and sunlight, the house will smell of bamboo groves and red fruits.
info: NPC装修任务 - 云果 - 邀请参观对话_云果

content: I drew it out. Here, this <style=Highlight>Bamboo Harvest House Blueprint</style>. I wanna ask you to look over it...

content: Gran'mama always said that greenery and sunlight are good for the eyes. I think my eyesight's gotten better today too, right mah?

content: {A想象}But mah, if only the house was a lickle bigger, I'd have more space for all my tools and the crops... that'd be wonderful loh~!

content: {A期待}Our house is like soil to us — we "grow up" strong if it's enriching and fertile. That must be why I've always dreamed of havin' one...
